title: PM congratulates Pak Army, scientists over launch of Fatah-II Guided Rocket System
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 15 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Wednesday congratulated the Pakistan Army and scientists over the successful launch of Fatah-II Guided Rocket System.
The prime minister, calling the launch an outcome of untiring efforts by Pakistan Army and scientists, expressed the hope that Fatah-II would help further strengthen the defence of Pakistan, according to a PM Office statement.
He said the constant efforts by the Pakistan Army and scientists continued to making Pakistanâ€™s defence impregnable.
